title: Watch Face Gear - Motor2
summary: The application is watch face for the Galaxy Gear.Galaxy Gear1/ Gear2/ Gear2 Neo
description: The application is watch face for the Galaxy Gear.Galaxy Gear1/ Gear2/ Gear2 NeoWhat's New Gear Faces!Enjoy a variety of watch faces for Galaxy Gear!You can create various watches using the Watch Styler.(Only Galaxy Gear1/ Galaxy Gear2/ Galaxy Gear2 Neo support.)Application includes 3 pieces of Watch faces.If you download and install the theme application, You can find the theme from Watch Styler.You can create various watches using the Watch Styler.Watch Style Download Guide- Please download Watch Styler through Gear Manager > Samsung Gear Apps.
descriptionHTML:
The application is watch face for the Galaxy Gear.Galaxy Gear1/ Gear2/ Gear2 Neo

What's New Gear Faces!
Enjoy a variety of watch faces for Galaxy Gear!
You can create various watches using the Watch Styler.
(Only Galaxy Gear1/ Galaxy Gear2/ Galaxy Gear2 Neo support.)


Application includes 3 pieces of Watch faces.
If you download and install the theme application, You can find the theme from Watch Styler.
You can create various watches using the Watch Styler.


Watch Style Download Guide
- Please download Watch Styler through Gear Manager > Samsung Gear Apps.
comments: No watch styler app I looked all over the Samsung app store and no watch styler app there. I looked online and no older versions of the app as well. It is a shame because I was looking forward to using these nice looking faces. I am using a S6 wth a Gear 2 neo. I hope they fix this soon.
Very cool Works perfect gives you a nice choice I have downloaded them all . Keep up the good work :)
Styler not found The watch styler cannot be found using the Samsung gear manager. It isn't there . This is a scum.
Very Nice It's really exciting to play, mix, match and dress-up this very good galaxy gear theme... I really enjoy this. Keep it for life!!!
RUBBISH It's not installing can I have my money back please sooner rather than later thanks
WARNING Do not buy this app it doesn't work or any of the other apps connected to this don't waste your time and money you been warn.
